title: Rep. Tom Emmer on Fox & Friends
summary: Emmer calls Mayor Frey 'Small Frey,' compares Walz to Jefferson Davis, says protesters are 'paid agitators,' dismisses Frey's warning that ICE 'invasion' could spread to other cities.
key_quotes: I wish 'Small Frey or Mayor Frey' would actually recognize the invasion IS an invasion of rapists, murderers, and pedophiles.
Tim Walz has sounded like Jefferson Davis seceding from the union, and Jacob Frey now sounds like he's giving his declaration of war speech.
It's almost like these guys are going back to another play on 'defund the police.'

title: Rep. Tom Emmer on Sid & Friends
summary: Emmer discusses SCAM Act to denaturalize citizens who commit felonies, laughs at racist joke about Somalis, calls Ilhan Omar 'one of the most racist, hateful anti-Semites,' questions her $30M net worth.
key_quotes: Thank God for President Trump's phenomenal leadership throughout this entire situation.
That mob that you're seeing, Sid, that mob is not reflective of Minnesota.
[On Ilhan Omar] She is one of the most racist, hateful anti-Semites that I have ever worked with.

title: Rep. Tom Emmer on Kudlow
summary: Emmer criticizes Walz, Ellison, and Frey for not cooperating with ICE, claims protesters are 'paid agitators' from outside Minnesota, says Democrats 'prefer to manage chaos than safety.'
key_quotes: This poor excuse for a mayor in Minneapolis...
These are paid agitators, primarily, and protesters.
They prefer to manage chaos than safety and security for their citizens.

title: Rep. Tom Emmer on Hannity
summary: Brief appearance after 16-minute Hannity monologue. Emmer hedges on Walz criticism, calls protesters 'paid agitators,' says Minnesotans want to 'thank the president' for removing 'worst of the worst.' Notable: Hannity never mentioned Alex Pretti by name.
key_quotes: I don't know that he did say exactly that [comparing ICE to Gestapo].
Will you please thank the president for his leadership in getting the worst of the worst off our streets?
The vast majority of Minnesotans are not reflective of that mob.
